name: Sun's Wrath
description:
The sun is dying. The world is a blasted wasteland. Activate the failsafe, bind the sun. 

Dash across the land and make your way through 3 levels to save the world. Use the shade to avoid the constant solar flares, navigate wastelands and caves in a last desperate attempt to bind the sun and stop its wrath. 

Controls:

  • WASD/Left Stick: Move
  • Space/A: Jump/Double Jump
  • 1/2/3/4: Change Window Size

Game by Marc Cook

Soundtrack by Ashley Keep

Created for the Low Rez Jam 2022
